verses.verse: רָנִּ֥י <S%H7442><s%> Sing עֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> O barren לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> thou [that] didst not bear פִּצְחִ֨י <S%H6476><s%> break forth רִנָּ֤ה <S%H7440><s%> into singing וְצַהֲלִי֙ <S%H6670><s%> and cry aloud לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no חָ֔לָה <S%H2342><s%> thou [that] didst not travail with child כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּ֧ים <S%H7227><s%> for more בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [are] the children שׁוֹמֵמָ֛ה <S%H8074><s%> of the desolate מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> than the children בְעוּלָ֖ה <S%H1166><s%> of the married wife אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הַרְחִ֣יבִי ׀ <S%H7337><s%> Enlarge מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place אָהֳלֵ֗ךְ <S%H168><s%> of thy tent וִירִיע֧וֹת <S%H3407><s%> the curtains מִשְׁכְּנוֹתַ֛יִךְ <S%H4908><s%> of thine habitations יַטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> and let them stretch forth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּחְשֹׂ֑כִי <S%H2820><s%> spare הַאֲרִ֙יכִי֙ <S%H748><s%> not lengthen מֵֽיתָרַ֔יִךְ <S%H4340><s%> thy cords וִיתֵדֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H3489><s%> thy stakes חַזֵּֽקִי׃ <S%H2388><s%> and strengthen

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֖אול <S%H8040><s%> and on the left תִּפְרֹ֑צִי <S%H6555><s%> For thou shalt break forth וְזַרְעֵךְ֙ <S%H2233><s%> and thy seed גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> the Gentiles יִירָ֔שׁ <S%H3423><s%> shall inherit וְעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities נְשַׁמּ֖וֹת <S%H8074><s%> and make the desolate יוֹשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> to be inhabited

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּֽירְאִי֙ <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תֵב֔וֹשִׁי <S%H954><s%> not for thou shalt not be ashamed וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּכָּלְמִ֖י <S%H3637><s%> neither be thou confounded כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תַחְפִּ֑ירִי <S%H2659><s%> for thou shalt not be put to shame כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> the shame עֲלוּמַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5934><s%> of thy youth תִּשְׁכָּ֔חִי <S%H7911><s%> for thou shalt forget וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach אַלְמְנוּתַ֖יִךְ <S%H491><s%> of thy widowhood לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תִזְכְּרִי־ <S%H2142><s%> and shalt not remember עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For בֹעֲלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1166><s%> [is] thine husband עֹשַׂ֔יִךְ <S%H6213><s%> For thy Maker יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name וְגֹֽאֲלֵךְ֙ <S%H1350><s%> and thy Redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> The God כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth יִקָּרֵֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> shall he be called

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when כְאִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H802><s%> thee as a woman עֲזוּבָ֛ה <S%H5805><s%> forsaking וַעֲצ֥וּבַת <S%H6087><s%> and grieved ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> in spirit קְרָאָ֣ךְ <S%H7121><s%> hath called יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְאֵ֧שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> and a wife נְעוּרִ֛ים <S%H5271><s%> of youth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when תִמָּאֵ֖ס <S%H3988><s%> when thou wast refused אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

בְּרֶ֥גַע <S%H7281><s%> moment קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> For a small עֲזַבְתִּ֑יךְ <S%H5800><s%> have I forsaken וּבְרַחֲמִ֥ים <S%H7356><s%> mercies גְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> thee but with great אֲקַבְּצֵֽךְ׃ <S%H6908><s%> will I gather

בְּשֶׁ֣צֶף <S%H8241><s%> In a little קֶ֗צֶף <S%H7110><s%> wrath הִסְתַּ֨רְתִּי <S%H5641><s%> I hid פָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> my face רֶ֙גַע֙ <S%H7281><s%> from thee for a moment מִמֵּ֔ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> but with everlasting רִֽחַמְתִּ֑יךְ <S%H7355><s%> will I have mercy אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> on thee saith גֹּאֲלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1350><s%> thy Redeemer יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> For this [is as] the waters נֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5146><s%> of Noah זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> When נִשְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> unto me for [as] I have sworn מֵעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> should no more go over מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> that the waters נֹ֛חַ <S%H5146><s%> of Noah ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So נִשְׁבַּ֛עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> so have I sworn מִקְּצֹ֥ף <S%H7107><s%> that I would not be wroth עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and וּמִגְּעָר־ <S%H1605><s%> with thee nor rebuke בָּֽךְ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> For the mountains יָמ֔וּשׁוּ <S%H4185><s%> shall depart וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and the hills תְּמוּטֶ֑נָה <S%H4131><s%> be removed וְחַסְדִּ֞י <S%H2617><s%> but my kindness מֵאִתֵּ֣ךְ <S%H853><s%> לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָמ֗וּשׁ <S%H4185><s%> shall not depart וּבְרִ֤ית <S%H1285><s%> from thee neither shall the covenant שְׁלוֹמִי֙ <S%H7965><s%> of my peace לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תָמ֔וּט <S%H4131><s%> be removed אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith מְרַחֲמֵ֖ךְ <S%H7355><s%> that hath mercy יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

עֲנִיָּ֥ה <S%H6041><s%> O thou afflicted סֹעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5590><s%> tossed with tempest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נֻחָ֑מָה <S%H5162><s%> [and] not comforted הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מַרְבִּ֤יץ <S%H7257><s%> behold I will lay בַּפּוּךְ֙ <S%H6320><s%> with fair colours אֲבָנַ֔יִךְ <S%H68><s%> thy stones וִיסַדְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H3245><s%> and lay thy foundations בַּסַּפִּירִֽים׃ <S%H5601><s%> with sapphires

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> And I will make כַּֽדְכֹד֙ <S%H3539><s%> of agates שִׁמְשֹׁתַ֔יִךְ <S%H8121><s%> thy windows וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> and thy gates לְאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stones אֶקְדָּ֑ח <S%H688><s%> of crystal וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and your entire גְּבוּלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1366><s%> and all thy borders לְאַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones חֵֽפֶץ׃ <S%H2656><s%> of pleasant

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בָּנַ֖יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> And all thy children לִמּוּדֵ֣י <S%H3928><s%> [shall be] taught יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְרַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> and great שְׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [shall be] the peace בָּנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H1121><s%> of thy children

בִּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> In righteousness תִּכּוֹנָ֑נִי <S%H3559><s%> shalt thou be established רַחֲקִ֤י <S%H7368><s%> thou shalt be far מֵעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <S%H6233><s%> from oppression כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִירָ֔אִי <S%H3372><s%> for thou shalt not fear וּמִ֨מְּחִתָּ֔ה <S%H4288><s%> and from terror כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> it will not תִקְרַ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> for it shall not come near אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> If גּ֥וֹר <S%H1481><s%> Behold they shall surely יָג֛וּר <S%H1481><s%> gather together אֶ֖פֶס <S%H657><s%> [but] not מֵֽאוֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> by me whosoever גָ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> shall gather together אִתָּ֖ךְ <S%H854><s%> for עָלַ֥יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> because יִפּֽוֹל׃ <S%H5307><s%> against thee shall fall

[הֵן כ] (הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2005><s%> behold ק) אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> Myself בָּרָ֣אתִי <S%H1254><s%> Behold I have created חָרָ֔שׁ <S%H2796><s%> the smith נֹפֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H5301><s%> that bloweth בְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire פֶּחָ֔ם <S%H6352><s%> the coals וּמוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> and that bringeth forth כְלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> an instrument לְמַעֲשֵׂ֑הוּ <S%H4639><s%> for his work וְאָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> Myself בָּרָ֥אתִי <S%H1254><s%> and I have created מַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> the waster לְחַבֵּֽל׃ <S%H2254><s%> to destroy

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every כְּלִ֞י <S%H3627><s%> No weapon יוּצַ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> that is formed עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִצְלָ֔ח <S%H6743><s%> against thee shall prosper וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every לָשׁ֛וֹן <S%H3956><s%> and every tongue תָּֽקוּם־ <S%H6965><s%> [that] shall rise אִתָּ֥ךְ <S%H854><s%> in לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> against thee in judgment תַּרְשִׁ֑יעִי <S%H7561><s%> thou shalt condemn זֹ֡את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַת֩ <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the heritage עַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> of the servants יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְצִדְקָתָ֛ם <S%H6666><s%> and their righteousness מֵאִתִּ֖י <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> [is] of me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס
